No-Bake Cheesecake

NO-BAKE LEMON CHEESECAKE

A light and refreshing no-bake lemon cheesecake with a protein kick.

20g
Protein
180
Calories
20m
Total Time
10
Yield

Nutrition per 1 slice

Carbs15g
Fat8g
Fiber1g
Sugar7g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 300g cream cheese
  • 150g plain Greek yogurt
  • 90g vanilla whey protein
  • 1 lemon, zested and juiced
  • 100g almond flour for crust
  • 50g melted coconut oil

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Make Crust

Combine almond flour and melted coconut oil. Press into the bottom of a springform pan.

2

Mix Filling

Beat cream cheese until smooth. Mix in Greek yogurt, vanilla whey protein, lemon zest, and lemon juice until well combined.

3

Pour

Pour the filling over the crust and spread evenly.

4

Chill

Refrigerate for at least 6 hours, or until firm.

5

Garnish

Garnish with lemon slices before serving.

6

Serve

Slice and enjoy your no-bake protein cheesecake.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
